participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Jessica is nostalgic and creative, with a passion for dance and music from her youth.
participant_1.background: i love new kids on the block. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Ryan is outgoing and adventurous, always looking for fun but also has a caring side as shown by his volunteer work.
participant_2.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i'm a party animal. i am deathly afraid of heights. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i own a cat and a dog.
